name: Mobius Escape
description:
Update: Corrected the Build  EXE

---

You are a prisoner of the great Mobius!
Will your experiencees as a climber help you to climb out from it's realm?
Will you be smart enough to solve the puzzles?

We will see...

---

Follow your ranking on the live High Score!

---

Controls:

W/A/S/D - Movement
Shift (toggle) - Jump
Space - Wait

R - Restart Level
Esc - Pause menu

---

A game made for the 9th ScoreSpaceJam!
Created by Oliminor and MatchaMaze
